description: Kombucha Moscow Mule is a refreshing, slightly tart drink perfect for summer sipping. This cocktail combines the best of both worlds -&nbsp;kombucha and vodka - for a refreshingly boozy treat.
name: Kombucha Moscow Mule

recipeInstructions.name: Fill a highball glass halfway with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill a highball glass halfway with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour in one part vodka (about 1.5 ounces) and top with 3 parts kombucha (4.5 ounces).
recipeInstructions.text: Pour in one part vodka (about 1.5 ounces) and top with 3 parts kombucha (4.5 ounces).

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with a generous squeeze of lime and lime wheel.
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with a generous squeeze of lime and lime wheel.
